price: 73 breuvages et bien d’autres avantages. Ne feront-ils pas preuve de reconnaissance ?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
